allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem; $zip = [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::OpenRead\(''sefaz-ceara.aponta-projetos-staging-1.1.64.vsix''\); $lib = $zip.Entries | Where-Object { $_.FullName -match ''lib/'' }; Write-Host ''Arquivos em lib/:''; $lib | ForEach-Object { Write-Host ''  '' $_.FullName }; $zip.Dispose\(\)")

Bash(powershell "Expand-Archive -Path ''sefaz-ceara.aponta-projetos-staging-1.1.64.vsix'' -DestinationPath ''./vsix-temp'' -Force; if \(Test-Path ''./vsix-temp/extension/lib''\) { Get-ChildItem ''./vsix-temp/extension/lib'' | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Name } else { Write-Host ''lib folder not found'' }; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ''./vsix-temp''")
